text: North, Central American and Caribbean youth bests in the sport of athletics are the all-time best marks set in competition by aged 17 or younger throughout the entire calendar year of the performance and competing for a member nation of the North American, Central American and Caribbean Athletics Association (NACAC). NACAC doesn't maintain an official list for such performances. All bests shown on this list are tracked by statisticians not officially sanctioned by the governing body. ==Outdoor== ht = hand timing A = affected by altitude OT = oversized track (> 200m in circumference) X = annulled due to doping violation ===Boys=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Athlete !Nationality !Date !Meet !Place !Age !Ref |- |100 m |10.15 (+2.0 m/s) |Anthony Schwartz | |31 March 2017 |Florida Relays |Gainesville, United States | | |- |200 m |20.13 (0.0 m/s) |Usain Bolt | |20 July 2003 |Pan American Junior Championships |Bridgetown, Barbados | | |- |300 m |32.90 |Zachary Shinnick | |13 February 2016 |California Winter Championships |Norwalk, United States | | |- |400 m |45.14 |Obea Moore | |2 September 1995 |Pan American Junior Athletics Championships |Santiago, Chile | | |- |800 m | | | | | | | | |- |1500 m | | | | | | | | |- |Mile | | | | | | | | |- |3000 m | | | | | | | | |- |5000 m | | | | | | | | |- |10000 m | | | | | | | | |- |110 m hurdles (91.4 cm) |12.96 (+1.3 m/s) |Jaheel Hyde | |23 August 2014 |Youth Olympic Games |Nanjing, China | | |- |110 m hurdles (99/100 cm) | | | | | | | | |- |110 m hurdles |13.32 (+0.7 m/s) |Dejour Russell | |24 June 2017 |Jamaican Championships |Kingston, Jamaica | | |- |300 m hurdles (91.4 cm) |36.45 |Bershawn Jackson | |13 May 2000 | |Gainesville, United States | | |- |400 m hurdles (84.0 cm) |49.01 |William Wynne | |15 July 2007 |World Youth Championships |Ostrava, Czech Republic | | |- |400 m hurdles (91.4 cm) | | | | | | | | |- |2000 m steeplechase | | | | | | | | |- |3000 m steeplechase | | | | | | | | |- |High jump |2.33 m |Javier Sotomayor | |19 May 1985 | |Havana, Cuba | | |- |Pole vault | | | | | | | | |- |Long jump |8.28 m (+1.8 m/s) |Maykel Demetrio Massó | |28 May 2016 |Memorial Barrientos |Havana, Cuba | | |- |Triple jump |17.41 m (+1.0 m/s) |Jordan A.
